title: Repayment of contributed surplus
context: ยง431:4-206 Repayment of contributed surplus. Contributions to the surplus of a domestic stock insurer, other than resulting from sale of its capital stock, shall not be subject to repayment except out of surplus in excess of the minimum surplus initially required of such an insurer transacting like classes of insurance. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
